Text: Ignore the dummy "ILoveTsundere" above me, spouting old memes. Thanks for the upload, works great. BTW, don't use appLocale, it doesn't work properly on Windows 7. Just set non-unicode to Japanese, and reboot, and it should work.
applocale works fine on win7, you just have to disable UAC to get it installed and make sure it runs with Admin rights.. :P

75% translation out.

http://www.hongfire.com/forum/showthread.php?t=343021

I will repackage the torrent when the 100% patch is released.

Thank you.
This game' more fun than I expected
Monster Lord's so hot ^_^
Eh too bad I got pretty far into it, game crashed and upon restart all the save files were gone. Great game though.

I've got a little problem, the game always crashes at the same spot where i'm fighting the first monster or "slime girl"
Anyone got anything?
@Firengun: Yes. Properly follow the instructions in the README, and it will work fine. That error happens when your system isn't setup properly for the game.
The game keeps crashing when the godess talks to me before the first fight can anyone help me?
You need to actually follow the instructions. I'm already at the end of the 75% english patch.
i did follow them it still does it but i suppose ill try again
You have to change your non-Unicode to Japanese. Then it will work.

When i downloaded this game i counted on some random mindless hentai. But it turned out that i tought wrong, it's far better! I recommend it ^^

Granberia ftw!
Actually just follow the read-me and you won't cratch. Just got to the end of this one's english patch, very very nice :)
